text: Erapara'o tomadera hrdaya kathina haye gela, yena pathara kimba tara tara ceye'o kathina. Athaca kono kono pathara to emana ya theke nadi-nala prabahita haya, ara kichu erupa ye, bidirna ha'oyara para ta hate pani nirgata haya, abara kichu emana ya allahâ€Œra bhaye dhbase pare [1], ara tomara ya kara allahâ€Œ se samparke gaphila nana
